thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Arbutus Consolidates HBV Business Around Warminster, PA Site

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Arbutus Consolidates HBV Business Around Warminster, PA Site
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Arbutus Biopharma Corp:
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA CORP - SITE CONSOLIDATION AND ORGANIZATIONAL RESTRUCTURING TO BETTER ALIGN ITS HBV BUSINESS IN WARMINSTER, PA
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA CORP - TO ACHIEVE ALIGNMENT, CO WILL REDUCE ITS GLOBAL WORKFORCE BY ABOUT 31 PERCENT AND PLANS TO CLOSE ITS BURNABY FACILITY
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA CORP - WILL INCUR RESTRUCTURING COSTS RELATED TO WORKFORCE REDUCTION AND SITE CLOSURE OF ABOUT $5.0 MILLION
* ARBUTUS BIOPHARMA CORP - ‍RESTRUCTURING COSTS WILL BE PRIMARILY PAID IN CASH IN Q2 OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
